WorkItem.Description: I have a few databases ported from mdb files that allowed a forward slash in the column name (i.e.  Type/Grade) when binding the data to the datasource of the DataGrid those columns with the forward slash are blank.  Could this be a bug?
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid forward slash in Column name returns nothing

Comments.Message:
We have filed a bug in our internal database to be fixed in a future release.

In the mean time, try attaching to the AutoGeneratingColumn event. You may be able to fix up the column and its binding in your handler.
It's not only the slash, it's also the dot.

I have successfully attached my data to the datagrid with columns that have a "/" in the value. I now have an issue when the column values are edited in the grid and on the end row editing, I am getting an "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." This only occurs for those columns with the "/" in the value. Any suggestions?
